LDAP_URL.description: LDAP Server's URL and port, used for user authentication

BASE_DN_LIST.description: Colon separated list of Base DNs

SEARCH_FILTER.description: LDAP filter used to find the user

JIRA_URL.description: JIRA's URL, used to allow access to JIRA Issues through REST API or the UI.

DTT_USERNAME.description: DTT's username to needed to give DTT access to ERICSSON Tools.

DTT_PASSWORD.description: DTT's password is needed to give DTT access to ERICSSON Tools and send emails.

DTT_EMAIL_ADDRESS.description: DTT's email address is to give DTT access to send emails.

DTT_EMAIL_PASSWORD.description: DTT's email address password to allow the Tool to send emails

DTT_URL.description: DTT's URL, used to allow adding a link to booking emails

CI_PORTAL_URL.description: CI Portal's URL, used to retrieve product-set drop and version information

TEAM_INVENTORY_TOOL_URL.description: Team inventory Tool's URL, used to retrieve data about Areas and Teams
